messages.subject: Thanks Kelly,Having trouble extending reservation!!!!!
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/12/2003 9:06:31 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... I ve been calling for weeks to try to add the Thurs. and Sun. nights to our already booked
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/12/2003 9:06:31 PM Eastern Standard Time,
kbcdlovejo@... writes:


> If anyone, who already has reservations, would like another night @ $79.00
> and the front desk won't give it to you, ask to be connected to Ken Ivey. He
>
> will straighten it out for you.
>

I've been calling for weeks to try to add the Thurs. and Sun. nights to our
already booked Fri and Sat. reservation and have had NO LUCK!!!!! I will
DEFINITLY call Ken Ivey tomorrow A.S.A.P. I have called NUMEROUS x's, left voice
messages and even emailed and gotten NO WHERE!!!!! I sure hope I can get things
resolved soon. I'm looking so forward to the conference but the reservation
department has really been ticking me off.
Thanks again,
Kimberly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
